column2: Eastern Invasion
The Eastern Invasion will occur shortly after 2705.
The Eastern Invasion will occur at a random date, though at the earliest 50 years after the game is started.
The Eastern Invasion will occur at a random date, though at the earliest 100 years after the game is started.
The Eastern Invasion will not occur.
American Invasion
The American Invasion will occur.
The American Invasion will not occur.
Chosen
Invader Nation Selection
The invader nation for the Eastern and American Invasion will be chosen randomly
The invader nation for the Eastern and American Invasion will be chosen by the player.
You have a strange feeling that you are right.
Playing As Invaders And Revolts
The player will be able to choose to play as invaders and special revolts, once their war starts.
The player won't be able to choose to play as invaders and special revolts.
You will now play as §Y[invasion_leader.GetTitledName]§! instead of §Y[This.GetTitledName]§!
Jacobinist Revolution
The Jacobinist Revolution will occur.
The Jacobinist Revolution will not occur.
Foreign Colonisation
Foreign Colonisation will occur shortly after 2640.
Foreign Colonisation will occur at a random date, though at the earliest 50 years after the game is started.
Foreign Colonisation will occur at a random date, though at the earliest 100 years after the game is started.
Foreign Colonisation will not occur.
Holy War Cooldowns
Declaring a holy war will impose a 5 or 10 year cooldown, preventing characters from declaring multiple holy wars in quick succession.
Declaring a holy war will not impose a cooldown, allowing characters to declare multiple holy wars in quick succession.
Fitna Fracture
Long lasting civil wars will split up realms.
Long lasting civil wars will NOT split up realms.
Animal Starts
Events to turn certain characters into animals is deactivated.
Events to turn certain characters into animals is activated.
NEOW Rules
Decadence
Decadence is used by Muslims, Jugoslavists and Calvinists.
Decadence is used by Calvinists but NOT by Muslims OR Jugoslavists.
Decadence is used by Jugoslavists but NOT by Muslims OR Calvinists.
Decadence is used by Muslims and Calvinists but NOT by Jugoslavists.
Decadence is used by Muslims and Jugolavists but NOT by Calvinists.
Decadence is used by Jugoslavists and Calvinists but NOT by Muslims.
Decadence is used by Muslims but NOT by Calvinists OR Jugoslavists.
Decadence is NOT used by Muslims, Jugoslavists and Calvinists.
Only Calvinists
Only Muslims
Only Jugoslavists
Only Jugoslavists and Calvinists
Only Muslims and Calvinists
Only Jugoslavists and Muslims
